text:
Hi folks,

We’re expanding our API/Integrations team and are looking for a developer who is comfortable with the HubSpot API, knows their way around node.js and loves to write JavaScript. Working knowledge of Python would be an advantage but not required.

Ideally, we’re looking for someone based in any of the following territories:
• UK
• South Africa
• EU
Please send me a DM if you’re interested in discussing the role.

John

Hello,
I'm a UX / UI / Graphic designer with 10+ experience in the market. I'm looking for an opportunity to work with a programming team or agency on websites on HubSpot.
Please, send me a DM if you're interested.

Hi!  We are just launching our website in HubSpot.  We are looking for someone to develop 2-3 custom templates in design studio for our company.  Ready to start asap.  Please let me know if you have any recommendations

Hi <@U01J4G55KEJ>,

We offers template design services and can help you quickly develop custom templates. please connect here <https://makewebbetter.com/HubSpot-ecommerce-agency/> or DM me.
